items.sentence: I talked to Tom\'s neighbors and co-workers.
Without Tom\'s help, Mary would have failed.
Without your help, I couldn\'t have done it.
Tom removed his glasses and rubbed his eyes.
Tom kept Mary waiting for about three hours.
Tom knew that Mary could be very persuasive.
Tom actually didn\'t do what he said he did.
Tom already knows exactly when he\'ll leave.
Tom and Mary became dependent on each other.
Tom and Mary both ordered the lunch special.
Tom wasn\'t as handsome as Mary said he was.
Tom put on his glasses to read the contract.
Tom put some branches into the wood chipper.
Tom raised his rifle and pointed it at Mary.
I told Tom that I couldn\'t go to his party.
I told Tom that I didn\'t know how to dance.
I told Tom that I wouldn\'t be at his party.
Tom doesn\'t know exactly how that happened.
Tom doesn\'t know exactly how to explain it.
Tom doesn\'t know how much money Mary makes.
Tom doesn\'t know how much money was stolen.
Tom doesn\'t know what Mary is trying to do.
Would you like me to massage your shoulders?
Tom usually leaves for school at about 7:30.
Tom wanted Mary to stay a little bit longer.
Don\'t act like you don\'t know what I mean.
I thought that\'s what you would\'ve wanted.
I thought that you\'d end up married to Tom.
Tom told me that he liked working in Boston.
People sometimes exaggerate their abilities.
Please cancel my order and refund the money.
Please do not leave your luggage unattended.
Please give me a piece of paper to write on.
Tom is no more suspicious than anybody else.
Tom is now attending a conference in Boston.
Tom put his arms around Mary and hugged her.
I used to be a singer in a heavy metal band.
I used to go out with friends every weekend.
I think Tom didn\'t really enjoy doing that.
I think Tom didn\'t understand the question.
I think Tom doesn\'t speak French very well.
Could you please briefly introduce yourself?
You really should\'ve stayed where you were.
I love the smell of pancakes in the morning.
I pawned my guitar in order to pay the rent.
What did you plant in your garden this year?
How long do I have to wait for the next bus?
I\'m sure that\'s what Tom would\'ve wanted.
Tom has trouble remembering people\'s names.
Tom hasn\'t heard from Mary since last June.
